subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Varitek and Eric Hinske scampered home when closer Chris Ray dropped the toss at first base on what could have been a game-ending groundout yesterday as the Boston Red Sox completed a six-run rally in the ninth inning for a 6-5 victory over the Baltimore Orioles.
